text_block_list.text:
Today is the day of the Selection Race, where trainers come to 
scout out Tracen's horsegirls and approach promising talents. 
It's an important event which decides many a horsegirl's future.

In the early hours of morning on this important day, 
I spot a lone horsegirl running intently on the track.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Phoo…! Good, one more… no, ten more laps!!
choice_data_list: Don't hurt yourself before the race, aye?
Try not to get hurt before the race, yeah?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: No, no, this doesn't even count as warmup to me!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
For I am El Condor Pasa! A horsegirl who will spread 
her wings through the whole world's skies one day!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡Uy! I casually started responding, but who are you!?
choice_data_list: I'm just a trainer, here for the race.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: A trainer?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That means… could it be, could it be… 
You're here to scout me, are you!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The Selection Race hasn't even started yet, but you've 
already been drawn in by El's power, talent, potential!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Bueno! I'm so glad you came to see me! 
Your passion is greatly impressive!
She's not listening…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: But I'm sorry, my answer right now is no.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
… Why is that, you ask? I rushed over here wanting to 
scout her right now, yet why, why won't El agree to it!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The answer is simple! Trainer, you must watch the 
race today and judge El's ability for yourself first!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
A trusting and passionate bond with her trainer! 
That is an essential ingredient to make a world-class horsegirl!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: That's why, Trainer, I want you to consider this carefully!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
…… Ah, but I can definitely feel the passion that drove you 
to talk to me before the race♪ You deserve 1 El point for that!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Ay! It's almost time for the race, too. 
I'm off, ciao～♪
El Condor Pasa took off like a bird……

Regardless of all that, the Selection Race had 
now begun, and its standout performer was ——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa! Her lead is stretching further and further! 
No one can keep pace with her!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
What amazing running talents!! 
El Condor Pasa takes an impressive first place!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Glorious! Meritorious! El's victorious!! 
This is my true poweeeer!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She just left them all behind on the final straight……! 
That one's head and shoulders above the rest……!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: She could turn out to be one hell of a horsegirl in the future…!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hehehen… I can hear the sounds of praise, the murmurs 
about world's mightiest horsegirl…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Venga, I'll listen to your offers! Who will be the trainer 
to take on the world with meee?!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: El Condor Pasa! I have a proposal to discuss with you!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Bollocks, you got nothing! I will see to it that you can take flight into the skies!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ooooh, bueno♪ I'm so happy to have your attentiooon!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
But but but! El is looking for a partner she can trust! 
And that means ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Get rready to rrumbleee! It's Scout Championship tiiime!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Scout Championship……?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yes! Training menus form an important 
element of being a trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
So everyone, get thinking on a menu to make 
El the strongest in the world, please!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Create one that flares up El's heart and she will join you!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
So that's what she's after…! 
We've got ourselves a "Training Menu Showdown"!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Bring it on! I got this in the bag…!
And so, the exuberant trainers dispersed ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Who's that still standing there…? Ah, of course! 
You with your overflowing passion!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: But nooo can do, sorry! I can't treat you differently!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Let me tell you a little secret though… 
I'm excited to see your training menu♪

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Because you wanted to scout me so badly you made a flying false start just to try!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I'll be waiting for you, Trainer!!

… So it came to be that I started thinking 
of a training menu for El Condor Pasa.
